alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Lucie, Indian River and southeastern Brevard Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 120 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palm Bay to Fellsmere to 8 miles southwest of Lakewood Park. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, and Fellsmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
